title: Liverpool FC news and transfer rumours: LIVE
content:
All the latest updates throughout the day on all things LFC and the team will be with you today from 9am to ensure constant coverage of all things Red, including news, great photos, nostalgia, live interviews and much more. 

There will be polls, stats and live webchats with our LFC reporter James Pearce each week, plus the inside line from Melwood as we bring you every press conference and interview. 

We want you to get involved too - tell us your thoughts on what's happening at Anfield by tweeting Joe @JoeRimmer88 or our LFC Twitter page @LivEchoLFC with all your thoughts on the days events. 

Today's top stories: 
     Good morning  Joe Rimmer    
Hello again and welcome to the Liverpool FC liveblog. I'm Joe Rimmer and, as always, I'm here to bring you all the very latest LFC news and views throughout the day. 

It's midweek and we can finally start to put the international fixtures in our rear-view and look onwards to the massive, huge, gigantic, enormous clash with Manchester United this weekend. 

Brendan Rodgers' men have a tough task on their hands, but what good a win would do them on Saturday evening. 

Right, I'm going to put the kettle on and then I'll get back to you with today's headlines. Don't go away.
